[`var HV_MSR_IA32_ARCH_CAPABILITIES: UInt32`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_msr_ia32_arch_capabilities)The value that represents the Model-Specific Register (MSR) that you use to enumerate processor ### [Model-Specific Registers](/documentation/Hypervisor/3727856-model-specific-registers#Model-Specific-Registers)

[Extending vCPU Capabilities Using Model-Specific Registers](/documentation/hypervisor/extending-vcpu-capabilities-using-model-specific-registers)Configure specific client performance monitoring and enable other vCPU capabilities using Model-Specific Registers.[`func hv_vcpu_read_msr(hv_vcpuid_t, UInt32, UnsafeMutablePointer<UInt64>) -> hv_return_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_vcpu_read_msr(_:_:_:))Returns, by reference, the current value of a Model-Specific Register (MSR) of a vCPU.[`func hv_vcpu_write_msr(hv_vcpuid_t, UInt32, UInt64) -> hv_return_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_vcpu_write_msr(_:_:_:))Sets the value of a Model-Specific Register (MSR) of a vCPU.[`func hv_vcpu_enable_native_msr(hv_vcpuid_t, UInt32, Bool) -> hv_return_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_vcpu_enable_native_msr(_:_:_:))Enables or disables a Model-Specific Register (MSR) that the VM uses natively.[`func hv_vcpu_set_msr_access(hv_vcpuid_t, UInt32, hv_msr_flags_t) -> hv_return_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_vcpu_set_msr_access(_:_:_:))Controls the guest access of a managed Model-Specific Register (MSR).[`func hv_vcpu_enable_managed_msr(hv_vcpuid_t, UInt32, Bool) -> hv_return_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_vcpu_enable_managed_msr(_:_:_:))Enables the guest access of a managed Model-Specific Register (MSR).[`typealias hv_msr_flags_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_msr_flags_t)The type representing the native Model-Specific Register (MSR) permissions.[MSR Permissions](/documentation/hypervisor/3567078-msr_permissions-enum)An enumeration that describes possible Model-Specific Register (MSR) permisssions.
